data.text: @Dubfreque @Vancouverismism And he wants another whiner, loser, parade to the CBC this weekend. He hates the media but obsessively stands in front of them every weekend. 🤮🤡
@Vancouverismism Sounds like he is going through withdraws cause there is no Russian trolls spreading disinformation, now that they have no access to twitter in Russia

@Vancouverismism Now I've even happier that I yelled "oh you're so oppressed, look up what's happening in Ukraine motherfuckers, fucking babies" while I drove by their little idiot rally at Robson/Burrard last Saturday.

@hollyh8sithere @Vancouverismism All of these clowns who are saying this shit should get on the next plane to Ukraine and see for themselves what’s happening if they don’t believe the media. I’ll even start a gofundme to pay their way,
@Dubfreque @Vancouverismism Imagine logging on to advertise how fucking stupid you are..
